name: METRO EXODUS
description: Metro Exodus, like the previous installments of the franchise, is inspired by the Metro novels written by Dmitry Glukhovsky. It is a classic offering of the FPS genre in terms of gameplay, but the storyline is quite unique.

name: FIFA 22
description: FIFA 22 takes the player back into the world's virtual stadiums to compete as the best football teams in the world. Enjoy over 700 club teams, or create your own to take on the Career mode. Face off against online players in FIFA Ultimate Team mode and climb the leaderboards with your dream team.

name: EURO TRUCK SIMULATOR 2
description: Get behind the wheel of a truck in Euro Truck Simulator 2 and become a professional driver traveling through Europe to deliver goods to every corner of the continent. Explore cities in the UK, Belgium, Germany and Poland, among other countries. Use the best of your driving skills or become a road devil in this 3D driving simulator.

name: FARMING SIMULATOR
description: In this edition of Farming Simulator, your crops and farm are going to look even more realistic thanks to the major graphical overhaul and you will be able to make use of many additional features, such as new crops, more machines, and even horses.

name: NBA 2K22
description: NBA 2K22 is a basketball sports game developed by Visual Concepts and published by 2K Games. It is the latest installment in the series of basketball video games.

name: DEAD BY DEADLIGHT
description: Dead by Daylight (PC) is an asymmetric multiplayer survival horror game. A group of up to four survivors will try to escape from a nightmare place where an assassin with supernatural powers wants to sacrifice them in the name of an evil god.

name: BATTLEFIELD 2042
description: Battlefield 2042 is a first-person shooter that marks the return to the iconic all-out warfare of the franchise. In a near-future world transformed by disorder, adapt and overcome dynamically-changing battlegrounds with the help of your squad and a cutting-edge arsenal.
